A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As the credits began to roll\, I sat in my seat alongside my friends stunned. To say this movie is a disappointment is quite honestly an understatement. Aside from the fantastic visuals and great music\, both the plot and characters have taken a turn for the worst in this film. Without giving away anything\, not only is there little to no character development\, but the vital plot points in this movie take an unexpected turn that is quite honestly just stupid. The plot is all over the place\, and the dozens and dozens of plot holes too big to ignore for me are why I give this film a 2/5
